title: BRIEF-TechnipFMC wins major contract for Woodside’s Pyxis Field in Australia
text:
BRIEF-TechnipFMC wins major contract for Woodside’s Pyxis Field in Australia

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 18, 2019 16:07)

© Reuters. BRIEF-TechnipFMC wins major contract for Woodside’s Pyxis Field in Australia Oct 18 (Reuters) - TechnipFMC PLC FTI.N : * Awarded a significant integrated Engineering, Procurement, Construction and Installation (EPCI) contract by Woodside for the development of the Pyxis and Xena fields, located in offshore North West Australia. * For TechnipFMC, a "significant" contract is between $75 million and $250 million

BRIEF-TechnipFMC wins major contract for Woodside’s Pyxis Field in Australia
description: BRIEF-TechnipFMC wins major contract for Woodside’s Pyxis Field in Australia
